languages.text: "Благодарю вас за возможность послужить на благо династии, Ваша Светлость". {n}Вистенца, сияя ослепительной улыбкой, склоняется перед вами.{/n} "Ваше приглашение было необычайно волнующим. Мне редко доводится покидать Янус".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю вас за возможность послужить на благо династии, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю вас за возможность послужить на благо династии, Ваша Светлость". {n}Вистенца, сияя ослепительной улыбкой, склоняется перед вами.{/n} "Ваше приглашение было необычайно волнующим. Мне редко доводится покидать Янус".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I don't often get a chance to leave Janus."

"Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I don't often get a chance to leave Janus."

"Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I don't often get a chance to leave Janus."

"Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I don't often get a chance to leave Janus."

"Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."

"Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."

languages.text: «Gracias por la oportunidad de servir al beneficio de su dinastía, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Vistenza se inclina ante ti con una sonrisa radiante.{/n} «Su invitación ha sido extremadamente emocionante. No suelo tener ocasión de abandonar Janus».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por la oportunidad de servir al beneficio de su dinastía, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Vistenza se inclina ante ti con una sonrisa radiante.{/n} «Su invitación ha sido extremadamente emocionante. No suelo tener ocasión de abandonar Janus».

languages.text: 「あなたの王朝に仕える機会をくださり、ありがとうございます、陛下」{n}ヴィステンツァは、晴れやかな笑顔でお辞儀をする。{/n}「お招きいただき、とても胸が躍りました。ヤヌスを離れる機会は滅多にありませんから」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの王朝に仕える機会をくださり、ありがとうございます、陛下」{n}ヴィステンツァは、晴れやかな笑顔でお辞儀をする。{/n}「お招きいただき、とても胸が躍りました。ヤヌスを離れる機会は滅多にありませんから」

languages.text: “感谢您给我这个机会，让我为您的王朝效力，大人。”{n}维丝坦萨带着灿烂的笑容，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“您的邀请真是让人激动不已，毕竟我很少有机会离开加努斯。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."

traits.locale_text: “感谢您给我这个机会，让我为您的王朝效力，大人。”{n}维丝坦萨带着灿烂的笑容，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“您的邀请真是让人激动不已，毕竟我很少有机会离开加努斯。”

languages.text: "Danke für diese Gelegenheit, dem Wohl Eurer Dynastie zu dienen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Vistenza verneigt sich mit einem strahlenden Lächeln vor dir.{/n} "Eure Einladung war ungeheuer aufregend. Ich bekomme nur selten die Gelegenheit, Janus zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für diese Gelegenheit, dem Wohl Eurer Dynastie zu dienen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Vistenza verneigt sich mit einem strahlenden Lächeln vor dir.{/n} "Eure Einladung war ungeheuer aufregend. Ich bekomme nur selten die Gelegenheit, Janus zu verlassen."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie de cette occasion qui m'est donnée de servir les intérêts de votre dynastie, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Vistenza s'incline devant vous avec un sourire radieux.{/n} « J'ai été enchantée de recevoir votre invitation. Ce n'est pas tous les jours que j'ai la chance de quitter Janus. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie de cette occasion qui m'est donnée de servir les intérêts de votre dynastie, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Vistenza s'incline devant vous avec un sourire radieux.{/n} « J'ai été enchantée de recevoir votre invitation. Ce n'est pas tous les jours que j'ai la chance de quitter Janus. »

languages.text: "Hanedanlık yararına hizmet etme fırsatı için teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Vistenza, göz alıcı bir gülümsemeyle önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Davetiniz son derece heyecan vericiydi. Janus'tan ayrılma şansına pek sık erişemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this opportunity to serve for your dynasty's benefit, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Vistenza bows before you with a radiant smile.{/n} "Your invitation was incredibly thrilling. I do not often get a chance to leave Janus."
